page.title: 09Forestry
page.content: Mr.Mc.Beth is the head forester in Moniaive.He looks after Dalmacallan Forest which has an area of 6000 hectares but he is also responsible for parts of Ae,Mabie and Upper Nithsdale Forests which brings the area he covers up to 20 000 hectares.He has to travel round making sure that his men are doing their jobs of planting,felling etc.and that things are running smoothly.He has seen a great deal of wildlife while doing his work but the time that he remembers the best was when he saw a golden eagle.
